Detailed Description

The class describes a X509 certificate , it is inherit base class Certificate, we can use it constractor a object. 

 Assume that we have a X509Certificate file path "test.crt".

 gaia::base String pStrCert = "test.crt";
 Certificate* pCert = new X509Certificate(pStrCert);

 gaia::base::String str = pCert->getSignature();
 gaia::base::String str = pCert->getIssuer();
 gaia::base::String str = pCert->getSubject();
 gaia::base::String str = pCert->getSignAlgorithm();
 Public* pKey = pCert->getPublic();

 bool bRet = pCert->checkByCurrentTime();

 char* pStr = pCert->exportEncodeData();

 bool bRet = pCert->verifySign(pIssuerPublicKey);
 bool bRet = pCert->verifySign(pIssuerCert);

 //free the char*
 free(pStr);
 //free the object
 delete pKey;
 delete pCert;
